Vilhelm was a servant who worked at the Szarr Palace of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Vilhelm was a human man with a pale light skin tone, blue eyes, and long light brown hair.
In the , Vilhelm was but one of many enthralled servants and guards who staffed the massive Szarr Palaceâ€”the home of vampire lord Cazador Szarr located in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate. When Cazadors ascension ritual began and kickstarted a massacre of the party guests behind a magically sealed door, Vilhelm was tasked with standing by the entrance, allowing invited guests in to their doom. Vilhelm knew of the rituals purpose and expected all Cazadors "children" to be in the Tourmaline Depths as the part of the ritual. Vilhelm both feared and was loyal to his master.
